Title: Extends provisions of law relating to the acquisition and disposition of real property by the metropolitan transportation authority
Summary: Extends provisions of law relating to the acquisition and disposition of real property by the metropolitan transportation authority.
LawCode: Amd Part P ยง2, Chap 39 of 2019
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part P of chapter 39 of the laws of 2019, amending the public authorities law relating to the acquisition and disposition of real property, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
